LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalBB.label: Recovery Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalBB.description: Beauty : 4 Comfort : 85% Immunity : +10% Surgery : +0% Tending : +10% A good medical bed, very confortable for peaceful recovery and long bed rest.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCA.label: Steel Medical Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCA.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : 75% Immunity : +10% Surgery : +10% Tending : +10% A Standard hospital bed, good for recovery medical care.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCC.label: Operating Table
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCC.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : 70% Immunity : +20% Surgery : +20% Tending : +20% A Surgery bed made for serious emergency interventions or complex operations.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCD.label: Emergency Stretcher
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalCD.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : 70% Immunity : +0% Surgery : +0% Tending : +20% A very light emergency stretcher of only 3kg, to take with you for long operations or emergency response in the field.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeBA.label: Wooden Pharmacy
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeBA.description: Beauty : 4 Immunity : +2.5% Surgery : +0% Tending : +2.5% Hospital Upgrade : A Wooden Pharmacy containing many essential things.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeBB.label: Tending Tools
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeBB.description: Beauty : 4 Immunity : +0% Surgery : +0% Tending : +5% Hospital Upgrade : Tending tools increasing general medical tend quality. Essential in an infirmary.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCA.label: Modern Pharmacy
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCA.description: Beauty : 2 Immunity : +5% Surgery : +0% Tending : +2.5% Hospital Upgrade : A very complete Pharmacy containing essential drugs and equipment for years.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCB.label: Steel Surgery Tools
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCB.description: Beauty : 2 Immunity : +2.5% Surgery : +5% Tending : +0% Hospital Upgrade : Standard medical tools for surgery.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCD.label: Surgery Lights
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCD.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 80W Immunity : +0% Surgery : +5% Tending : +0% Hospital Upgrade : A surgical lamp to help during delicate operations. Must be placed next to a medical bed.
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCE.label: Wall Monitor
LanguageData.SadjuukHospitalUpgradeCE.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 50W Immunity : +5% Surgery : +5% Tending : +5% Hospital Upgrade : A monitor showing the patient's vital functions. Must be placed next to a medical bed.
